# Government Tender Announcement: T3033-2324X3

## Tender Details

* **Title (English):** Runway Sweeper

* **Reference Number:** WS3647866565-Doc3647902634

* **Solicitation Number:** WS3647866565
* **Publication Date:** 2022-09-07
* **Tender Closing Date and Time:** 2022-10-14T14:00:00
* **Amendment Date:** 2022-10-11

## Tender Classification and Specifications

* **UNSPSC Codes:** 25101900 (Specialized and Recreational Vehicles), 25101926 (Snow Plow Truck), 25190000 (Transportation Services Equipment), 25191500 (Air Transportation Support Systems and Equipment)
* **UNSPSC Descriptions (English):** Specialized and Recreational Vehicles, Snow Plow Truck, Transportation Services Equipment, Air Transportation Support Systems and Equipment
* **UNSPSC Descriptions (French):** Véhicules spécialisés et de loisir, Camion chasse-neige, Équipements pour les services de transport, Systèmes et équipements d'appui au transport aérien

## Procurement and Contract Information

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Limited Tendering Reason:** None
* **Trade Agreements:** World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), etc. (Refer to the complete list of trade agreements in the original tender announcement)

* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-11-04
